org.contentmine.svg2xml.page

Class PageCropper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.svg2xml.page.PageCropper

  • public class PageCropper
extends java.lang.Object
    extracts parts of page through user-supplied crop boxes will gradually accrete unit conversion, offsets, etc. The user informs PageCropper of their cropping media box, then creates a cropBox in their own units,
    Author:
    pm286

      • setTLBRUserMediaBox

        public void setTLBRUserMediaBox(Real2 xy0,
                                Real2 xy1)
        the transformation used by the cropper. this allows for transformation between units, y-direction, offsets, etc. Note that Real2Range cannot hold negative ranges so we don't have a traditional box e.g. Inkscape has Y coordinates UP the page from bottom = 0 to top = 800 so Inkscape cropMediaBox = Real2(0, 800), Real2(600, 0)
        Parameters:
        xy0 - one corner
        xy1 - opposite corner
